GSP29udnyku4u:3: nanu sadapīśvarajñānaṃ na pramāṇam, tallakṣaṇāyogāt; anadhigatārthagantustathābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:9: na cotpadyamānāpi pramāturanapekṣiteti na pramā, prāmāṇyasyātadadhīnatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:11: tadanapekṣatvena tu tasya pramāṇye taduttarasyāpi tathaiva syāt, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:15: [ku.4.503] tat phalaṃ pramaiva na bhavati gṛhītamātragocaratvāt smṛtivaditi cenna- yathārthānubhavatvaniṣedhe sādhye bādhitatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:33: gṛhītavismṛtārthaśrutau kā vārtā? apramaivāsāviti cet- gatamidānīṃ vedaprāmāṇyapratyāśayā /
GSP29udnyku4u:34: nahyanādau saṃsāre,“svargakāmo yajete'ti vākyārthaḥ kenacinnāvagataḥ; sandehe 'pi prāmāṇyasandehāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:42: nanu smṛtiḥ pramaiva kiṃ na syāt yathārthajñānatvāt pratyakṣādyanubhūtivaditi cenna,
GSP29udnyku4u:50: [ku.4.508] evaṃ vyavasthite tarkyate 'pi yat- iyamanubhavaikaviṣayā satī tanmukhanirīkṣaṇena tadyathārthatvāyathārthatve anuvidhīyamānā tatprāmāṇyamavya(na)
GSP29udnyku4u:52: iti vyavahāre 'pi pūrvānubhava eva pramitiḥ, anapekṣatvāt; na tu smṛtiḥ, nityaṃ tadapekṣaṇāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:65: ananubhūtepi tarhi smaraṇaṃ syāditi cet- kiṃ na syāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:69: so 'nyathā na syāditi cet- tat kiṃ bauddhavat viṣayākārānyathānupapattyā viṣayasiddhistvayāpīṣyate?
GSP29udnyku4u:70: tathābhūtaṃ jñānameva vā tatsiddhiḥ? ādye tadvadevānaikāntikatvam /
GSP29udnyku4u:71: na hi yadākāraṃ jñānam, tatpūrvakatvaṃ tasyeti niyamaḥ; anāgatajñāne vibhrame ca vyabhicārāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:74: kiṃ naśchinnamiti cet- na tarhi smṛtyanubhavayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhiriti /
GSP29udnyku4u:78: na ca tadeva jñānaṃ kālabhedenāpramāṇam; anapekṣatvasyāparāvṛtteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:80: [ku.4.511] syādetat- anupakārakaṃ (216) viṣayasya tadīyametadīyaṃ vā na bhavitumarhati, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:81: na ca tasyetyaniyataṃ tatra pramāṇam, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:89: na hi tatra jñānena kiñcit kriyate iti śakyamavagantum; asatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:90: na ca taddharmasāmānyādhāraṃ kiñcit kriyate iti yuktam; tena tasyaiva viṣayatvaprāpteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:92: tat kiṃ cakṣuṣā ghaṭe jñāyamāne raso 'pi jñāyate, tādātmyāt?
GSP29udnyku4u:94: iti cet- atha rasākāreṇa kiṃ na jñāyate?
GSP29udnyku4u:95: tena rūpeṇa jñātatānādhāratvāditi cet- na tarhi vartamānasāmānyajñāne 'pyatītānāgatādijñānam;
GSP29udnyku4u:98: na;- (anaikāntyā) anekāntādasiddhervā na ca liṅgamiha kriyā /
GSP29udnyku4u:101: na hi śarasaṃyogena gagane kiñcit kriyate; antyaśabdābhivyaktyā (217) vā (śabde?) /
GSP29udnyku4u:104: na hi taiḥ prameye kiñcit kriyate; api tu pramātaryeva /
GSP29udnyku4u:113: sākṣātkṛto 'yamartha iti viśeṣato viṣayaviśeṣaṇameva kiñcit parisphuratīti cet /
GSP29udnyku4u:115: yathā hi- ” arthenaiva viśeṣo hi nirākāratayādhiyām” /
GSP29udnyku4u:116: tathā- kriyayaiva viśeṣo hi vyavahāreṣu karmaṇām //4 //
GSP29udnyku4u:117: kiṃ na paśyasi, ghaṭakriyā paṭakriyetivat kṛto ghaṭaḥ kariṣyate ghaṭa ityādi /
GSP29udnyku4u:118: tathaiva gṛhāṇa, ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamitivat jñāto ghaṭo jñāsyate jñāyate iti /
GSP29udnyku4u:119: kathamasambaddhayordharmadharmibhāva iti cet- dhvasto ghaṭa iti yathā /
GSP29udnyku4u:120: etadapi kathamiti cet- nūnaṃ dhvaṃsenāpi ghaṭe kiñcit kriyate iti vaktumadhyavasito 'si /
GSP29udnyku4u:121: tannirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇo dhvaṃsaḥ svabhāvādeva tadīya iti kimatra sambandhāntareṇeti cet- prakṛte 'pyevameva /
GSP29udnyku4u:129: jñātatayā hi jñānamanumīyeta, jñāte ca tadvyavahārānyathānupapattistāṃ jñāpayet /
GSP29udnyku4u:136: vyavahārānyathānupapattyaiva siddha āśraya iti cenna- jñānahetunaiva tadupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:142: na hyetāvatā jñānaṃ taditi siddhyati, tasyaivāsiddheḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:143: tathāpi niyatasya kartuḥ pravṛtteḥ kartṛdharmeṇaiva kenacit pravṛttihetunā bhavitavyamiti cet- astvicchā pratyakṣasiddhā; na tu jñānam /
GSP29udnyku4u:144: saiva kathaṃ niyatādhikaraṇe (ṇa) utpadyatāmiti cenna- jñānābhyupagame 'pi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:145: svahetoḥ kutaściditi cet- tata evecchāstu, kiṃ jñānakalpanayeti /
GSP29udnyku4u:148: tata icchāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ vilakṣaṇameva kiñcit parikalpanīyam,
GSP29udnyku4u:149: yasmin sati susvāpalakṣaṇamaudasīnyamarthaviṣayamātmano nivartate iti cet- hantaivaṃ susvāpanivṛttimanubhavaniddhāṃ pratijānānena jñānamevāparokṣyamiṣyante /
GSP29udnyku4u:150: acetayanneva hi suṣupta ityucyate; acaitanyanivṛttireva hi caitanyaṃ jñānamiti /
GSP29udnyku4u:153: apica kimidaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ nāma? yadyāśutaravināśitvam, tadānaikāntikam /
GSP29udnyku4u:158: na prathamaḥ, tasya kṣaṇasyātītatvāt; pratyakṣajñānasya ca vartamānābhavatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:166: tathā ca jñānaṃ prathame yamarthamālambya jātam,
GSP29udnyku4u:171: tadanuvṛttau vā kathaṃ jñeyanivṛttiriti cet- kimasminnanupapannam?
GSP29udnyku4u:175: na ca jñānāntaragrāhyam, jñānayaugapadyaniṣedhena samānakālasya tasyābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:177: grāhyakāle ca grāhakasyānāgatatvāt- iti cet- nanvevaṃ jñātatāpi na pratyakṣā syāt, kṣaṇikatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:183: kṣaṇikatvameva tasyāḥ kuta iti cet- tvaduktayuktereva /
GSP29udnyku4u:184: tathāhi- yaṃ kṣaṇamāśritya jātā tataḥ paramapi tamevāśrayante anyaṃ vā, na vā kamapīti /
GSP29udnyku4u:189: na cānyamapi kṣaṇaṃ jñānamavagāhate, tadānīṃ tasyāsattvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:192: [ku.4.521] atītenāpi tenaiva kṣaṇenopalakṣitānuvartate iti cet- evaṃ tarhi vartamānārthatā prakāśasya (223) na syāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:196: [ku.4.522] atha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti sthūla eva vartamānaḥ prakāśenāśrīyate ityabhyupagamaḥ,
GSP29udnyku4u:197: tadā tajjñānasyāpi sa eva viṣaya iti tasyāpi na kṣaṇikatvamiti /
GSP29udnyku4u:198: [ku.4.523] nanu (4) jñānamaindriyakaṃ cet, viṣayasañcāro na syāt,sañjātasambandhatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:202: dharmiṇaśca sannidhimātreṇa jñāne jijñāsāpekṣaṇe vā ubhayathāpyanavasthānāditi- tanna- jñātatāpakṣe 'pi tulyatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:203: tasyā api hi jñeyatve tatparamparājñānāpātāt; jijñāsāniyamasya ca tadvadanupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:205: svabhāvata eva kācidasāvajijñāsitāpi jñāyate, na tu sarveti cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku4u:206: prāgutpannajñātatāsmaraṇajanitajijñāsaḥ samunmīlitanayanaḥ sañjātajñānasamutpāditaprākaṭyaṃ jijñāsureva pratipadyate ityato nānavastheti cet- tulyametat /
GSP29udnyku4u:209: tasya nirvikalpakapūrvakatvād; nirvikalpakagṛgītasya tāvatkālānavasthānāt; tasya tenaiva vināśāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:210: nāpi kevalanirvikalpakavedyam, tasya savikalpakonneyatvena tadabhāve pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:215: tatastatpuraḥsaraṃ prathamata eva tajjātīyasya jñānāntarasya vikalpanāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:228: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- tasmin sati tadbalādeva; asati tu tajjanitavāsanābalāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:230: na ca viṣayāṃśe tattathā syāditi yuktam- avacchedakatayā prāgavasthāvadavabhāsanāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:234: atha grahaṇatve 'pi kuta etadaparokṣākāram? kāraṇāntaranirapekṣeṇa saṃskārādhika(225)
GSP29udnyku4u:236: atha kaḥsannikarṣaḥ? jñānena saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ, tadarthena saṃyuktasamavetaviśeṣaṇatvamiti /
GSP29udnyku4u:237: manaso nirapekṣasya bahirvyāpāre 'ndhabadhirādyabhāvaprasaṅga iti cet- jñānāvacchedakaṃ prati nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:240: [ku.4.526] athāpi jñānaṃ pratyakṣamityatra kiṃ pramāṇam? pratyakṣameva /
GSP29udnyku4u:244: ata eva ca na tadaśrayaḥ pramāteti- ucyate- mitiḥ samyak paricchittistadvattā ca pramātṛtā /
GSP29udnyku4u:250: na tat pramākaraṇamiti tviṣyata eva,pramayā sambandhābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:255: na tu pramātṛtvamiti cet- na- nimittasamāveśena vyavahārasamāveśāvirodhāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:260: [ku.4.528] syādetat- pramīyate 'neneti pramāṇam, pramiṇotīti pramātā iti kārakaśabdatvamanayoḥ /
GSP29udnyku4u:261: tathāca kathamakārakamartha iti cet- na- etasya vyutpattimātranimittatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:263: anyathā asmadādiṣu na pramātṛvyavahāraḥ syāt; sarvatra svātantryābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:271: tadaitasya viṣayamaspṛśato na jñānāvagāhanasambhava iti tadartho 'pyālambanamabhyupeyam /
GSP29udnyku4u:273: tadanavagāhane vā asmadādervibhramān aviduṣastadupaśamāyopadeśānāmasarvajñapūrvakatvamiti na- vibhramasyāprāmāṇye 'pi tadviṣayasya tattvamullikhato 'bhrāntatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:275: tathāpyāropitārthavacchinnajñānālambanatvena kathaṃ na bhrāntatvamiti cet- na- yad yatra nāsti tatra tasyāvagatiriti bhrāntyarthatvāt /
GSP29udnyku4u:277: nahi na tadrajatam, nāpi tatrāsat, nāpi tannāvagatamiti /
